The Southern most tip of Africa is dominated by three towns.
. Whale watching in the spring is fascinating as are the spring flowers. Fishing, Scuba Diving, Surfing are great in this part of the world.

Struisbaai is a coastal village boasting the longest continuous stretch of white sand coastline in the Southern part of Africa.
Struisbaai also boasts the picturesque harbor, the fishing cottages of Hotagterklip, 2km north of town is a favorite subject with South African painters. Some of the old fishermen's cottages have been restored and are now protected as national monuments. You could also view the Cape Agulgas light house, one of the oldest in South-Africa, and the most southern tip of Africa, where the two Oceans, The Indian and Atlantic Oceans meet in the Aghulas National Park.

value: Body boarding and surfing outside the harbor.
Fishing from the beach or harbor jetty.
Take a ride through the Agulhas Nature Reserve.
Just enjoy the blue sky country at its best.
